sentences.en: An auto repair manual can tell how to tune up your car.
sentences.cn: 汽车维修手册可以告诉你怎么修复你的车子.

sentences.en: Auto-tuning VHF receivers are now common in cars.
sentences.cn: 自动调节甚高频接收器现在普遍应用于汽车。

sentences.en: Did the driver come for you in a new big shiny auto?
sentences.cn: 有个司机开一部大型闪亮的新车来接你 吗 ?
别把你的汽车停在这儿.

sentences.en: Henry Ford was a pioneer in the auto industry.
sentences.cn: 亨利·福特是汽车工业的先驱.

sentences.en: I published his auto-biography, which was very competently ghosted by a woman journalist from the Daily Mail.
sentences.cn: 我出版了《每日邮报》的女记者为他代笔的自传，写得颇具文采。

sentences.en: Only a hardy man should enter the auto race.
sentences.cn: 只有胆大的人才能参加摩托赛.

sentences.en: That did not make him the top - paid auto magnate by any means.
sentences.cn: 不过这绝不是说,他就可以算得上收入最高的汽车大亨.

sentences.en: The auto - makers recalled a lot of cars that were unsafe.
sentences.cn: 汽车制造商召回许多不安全的车辆.

sentences.en: The auto - teller machines are built like fortresses.
sentences.cn: 自动出纳机建造得象堡垒一样.

sentences.en: The auto industry has often been arrogant, but it's not that callous.
sentences.cn: 汽车业人士常常是傲慢的, 但也不至于那么狠心肠.

sentences.en: The auto plant now has an annual capacity of 12,000 cars.
sentences.cn: 这家汽车厂现在每年能生产一万二千辆汽车.

sentences.en: The mass of public opinion is in favor of no - fault auto insurance.
sentences.cn: 舆论的主要方面是赞同无过失汽车保险.

sentences.en: The problems of the auto industry have created economic ripples through the rest of the economy as well.
sentences.cn: 汽车业的问题造成其他行业也出现了经济上的连锁反应。

sentences.en: Typical composition of the auto exhausts is given in Table IV - 6 .
sentences.cn: 汽车尾气的典型成分示于表Ⅳ -6 中.

words.tran_cn: 链式反应扩大；[物化] 自动催化作用
